SEARCH
Package gw.pl.util

Class ResultsBuffer

java.lang.Object
gw.pl.util.ResultsBuffer
public class ResultsBuffer extends Object
Utility class for generating structured human-readable strings detailing a set of operations and the results thereof. Useful in command-line tool situations where a serializable interface is being used to pass results back, but a non-trivial number of operation is being performed, which necessitates a more complicated and possibly hierarchical output format.
